title: Frederick B. Patterson Apartment: Bathroom
medium: Brush and watercolor, gouache, graphite on illustration board
description: View of bathroom, facing sink, with brown marble walls and brown fixtures.  Above sink, mirror with mirror and glass shelving units on either side.  Above tub at left, "exotic" painted tile [?] decoration in brown and white.  White shag rug on floor with low white upholstered chair at lower left.
name: Drawing
